article_title: State Debate: Scott Walker tells Hoosiers why he likes Ted Cruz; Beloit Daily News wants the draft reinstated
article_text:
Madison, WI (53711)

Today

Considerable cloudiness.

Tonight

Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 63F. Winds light and variable.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , cruz, scott walker, medicaid, irs, flat tax, republican, bill kaplan, jon erpenbach, wisconsin, martin schreiber, steve walters
